keyChoices.choiceDescription: If set, {{ entname }} will be disabled on map load. Players cannot spawn here until the {{ entname }} is triggered by another entity targetting it.
Player will spawn rappeling down using a rope (like rappeling soldiers) until arriving at the ground.
If set, only players having their targetname match the "Filter player targetname" can spawn here.
If set along with "Filter player targetname", only players having a different targetname than set by "Filter player targetname" can spawn here.
If set, the {{ entname }} will trigger its target whenever a player respawns at its position.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: If set, every player spawning here will get this string as his/her targetname.
Targetname required on the player to spawn here, or targetname not allowed to spawn here, if "Invert filter" flag is set.

Name of the [multisource](../multisource) entity that (temporary) disables this {{ entname }}. If master is specified the {{ entname }} won't spawn anyone here. When multisource entity is triggered/being triggering by all possible inputs, the {{ entname }} will be enabled and ready to spawn players here. When multisource lost at least one input signal, the entities becomes disabled again.
Speed, in units per second, with which the player will rappel down, if that is enabled.
Set the use-type with which the entity specified in "Target" will be triggered (after someone spawns here).
